languages.text: {n}Уродливый мутант уже не держится с вами так нагло, как в прошлый раз. С оружием и без сотни ран вы, видимо, выглядите более представительно.{/n}
{n}The hideous mutant does not look as cocky as the last time you met. Armed and not bleeding from a hundred wounds, you must be a more formidable sight.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Уродливый мутант уже не держится с вами так нагло, как в прошлый раз. С оружием и без сотни ран вы, видимо, выглядите более представительно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The hideous mutant does not look as brazen as the last time you met. Armed and not bleeding from a hundred wounds, you must be a more formidable sight.{/n}
traits.speaker: TrampMain

traits.locale_text: {n}The hideous mutant does not look as cocky as the last time you met. Armed and not bleeding from a hundred wounds, you must be a more formidable sight.{/n}
traits.speaker: TrampMain

traits.locale_text: {n}The hideous mutant does not look as cocky as the last time you met. Armed and not bleeding from a hundred wounds, you must be a more formidable sight.{/n}
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}その醜悪な変異体は、前回会ったときほど得意げには見えない。武装し、百の傷から血を流すことのないあなたは、もっと恐ろしく見えるに違いない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hideous mutant does not look as cocky as the last time you met. Armed and not bleeding from a hundred wounds, you must be a more formidable sight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その醜悪な変異体は、前回会ったときほど得意げには見えない。武装し、百の傷から血を流すことのないあなたは、もっと恐ろしく見えるに違いない。{/n}
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}这个丑陋的变种人打量着你，眼神已经不再像上次见面时那么傲慢了。此刻的你并没有浑身是伤，而是全副武装，看起来令人生畏。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hideous mutant does not look as cocky as the last time you met. Armed and not bleeding from a hundred wounds, you must be a more formidable sight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这个丑陋的变种人打量着你，眼神已经不再像上次见面时那么厚颜无耻了。此刻的你并没有浑身是伤，而是全副武装，看起来令人生畏。{/n}
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}El horrible mutante no parece tan descarado como la última vez que os visteis. Armad{mf|o|a} y libre de heridas eres todo un espectáculo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hideous mutant does not look as cocky as the last time you met. Armed and not bleeding from a hundred wounds, you must be a more formidable sight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El horrible mutante no parece tan descarado como la última vez que os visteis. Armad{mf|o|a} y libre de heridas eres todo un espectáculo.{/n}
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Der widerwärtige Mutant wirkt nicht mehr ganz so mutig wie bei Eurer letzten Begegnung. Wenn du bewaffnet bist und nicht aus einhundert Wunden blutest, bietest du wohl einen etwas formidableren Anblick.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hideous mutant does not look as cocky as the last time you met. Armed and not bleeding from a hundred wounds, you must be a more formidable sight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der widerwärtige Mutant sieht nicht mehr ganz so kühn aus wie bei Eurer letzten Begegnung. Wenn du bewaffnet bist und nicht aus einhundert Wunden blutest, bietest du wohl einen etwas formidableren Anblick.{/n}
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}L'abominable mutant n'a pas l'air moitié aussi confiant que lors de votre dernière rencontre. Comme quoi, il suffit parfois d'être armé et en bonne santé pour impressionner.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hideous mutant does not look as cocky as the last time you met. Armed and not bleeding from a hundred wounds, you must be a more formidable sight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'abominable mutant n'a pas l'air moitié aussi confiant que la dernière fois que vous vous êtes croisés. Comme quoi, il suffit parfois d'être armé et en bonne santé pour impressionner.{/n}
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Korkunç mutant, son karşılaşmanızdaki kadar kibirli görünmüyor. Silahlı oluşun ve yaralarının sarılı olması, seni onun gözünde daha korkulası kılmış olmalı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The hideous mutant does not look as cocky as the last time you met. Armed and not bleeding from a hundred wounds, you must be a more formidable sight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Korkunç mutant, son görüştüğünüzdeki kadar kibirli gözükmüyor. Silahlı ve yüzlerce yara yüzünden kan dökmüyor olduğun için göz korkutucu gözüküyor olmalısın.{/n}
traits.speaker: TrampMain
